pageProduct.name: Thompson's One-a-day Milk Thistle 42000mg 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's One-A-Day Milk Thistle 42000mg Traditional Western herb used to support liver health & natural liver detoxification processes and supports digestive system health

Thompson's One-A-Day Milk Thistle 42000 contains a high strength milk thistle extract formulated for convenience with a One-A-Day dose. It is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to:
- Enhance & maintain liver health and protect the liver
- Support natural liver detoxification processes
- Support bile production & promote flow from liver and gallbladder
- Relieve digestive discomfort, abdominal bloating & flatulence
Milk Thistle is also used as a source of antioxidant to help reduce free radicals formed in the body and their damage to body cells.

Size: 60caps

Oil-Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• High potency formula
• aid the natural cleansing processes of the gut, to help with body waste elimination
• source of antioxidant to help protect body cells from free radical oxidative damage
• Enhance liver health & promote healthy liver function
• Relieve digestive discomfort
• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.

CAUTION

Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each capsule contains: Silybum marianum (Milk Thistle) ext. 600mg
derived from herb seed dry 42g (42000mg)
std. to contain Flavanolignans calc. as Silybin 420mg

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove cap. Recycle glass bottle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
